statements: UPDATE stakeholder_engagement SET stakeholder_name='John Doe', interactive_map_url='http://example.com/map1', report_url='http://example.com/report1' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE stakeholders SET name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE stakeholders SET name='John Doe', location='New York' WHERE id=1;
